content: election day in the united states is coming soon and i wanted a pattern for a pair of socks i could wear when i go out to vote in november there aren t very many sock patterns so i created this little sock design that i can wear on november 5 2024 knit along with me to be ready to make our voices heard voting is the cornerstone of our democracy and it remains an important tool to hold our officials accountable and participate in shaping our future i encourage you to register to vote check your voter registration and make a plan with a friend to vote for all levels of government on election day techniques these socks are knit top-down with one colorwork chart and an afterthought heel materials yarn 3 colors fingering weight yarn exact yarn usage for socks will depend on size height of leg and length of foot suggested yarns is knit picks stroll mc white 50-100g cc1 blue 10-20g cc2 red 10-20g needles size 1 needles or needle size required to achieve sock fit preference needle style may be double pointed needles 24 circular needle or 9 circular needle as preferred additional materials tapestry needle stitch marker scissors waste yarn
